item.title: Pixel Velocity® Adds Key Leaders to Management Team
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
Contact: Jonathan Murray, jmurray@pixel-velocity.com, 734-215-7577 Ann Arbor, May 7, 2019—Pixel Velocity is pleased to announce that it has added talented executives in sales, marketing, engineering, and finance to support market demand for its Event Velocity® software. Event Velocity is a digital operations software platform for automating the monitoring and management of remote and hazardous assets. [...]

The post Pixel Velocity<sup>®</sup> Adds Key Leaders to Management Team appeared first on Pixel Velocity.

item.title: Pixel Velocity® and Dell Technologies Team Up To Launch of IoT Connected Bundles to Help Industrial Companies Digitize Operations at the Edge
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
ANN ARBOR, Mich., Sept. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Pixel Velocity® is pleased to announce that its Event Velocity® software will feature in the launch of Dell Technologies' IoT Connected Bundles program to help industrial operating companies across the globe accelerate their adoption of IoT solutions to remain competitive and achieve new workforce scale, operating safety and asset [...]

The post Pixel Velocity<sup>®</sup> and Dell Technologies Team Up To Launch of IoT Connected Bundles to Help Industrial Companies Digitize Operations at the Edge appeared first on Pixel Velocity.

item.title: Pixel Velocity® Wins Award for New Technology Development of the Year-Product
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
ANN ARBOR, Mich., April 5, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- The Oil and Gas Awards recognized Pixel Velocity®'s product solutions for New Technology Development of the Year-Product at the Northeast Region ceremony on March 30, 2016 in Pittsburgh, PA. Pixel Velocity® was judged by a panel of over 90 industry leaders, ranging from CEOs to experts. [...]

The post Pixel Velocity<sup>®</sup> Wins Award for New Technology Development of the Year-Product appeared first on Pixel Velocity.

item.title: Pixel Velocity® Releases Innovative Hydrocarbon Leak Detection System and Event Management Platform
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
ANN ARBOR, Mich., July 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ — Pixel Velocity® (“Pixel”), an Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) product technology company specializing in imagery and sensor data analytics, announced today that it has released four new products including a hydrocarbon leak detection system and event management software platform. This product ecosystem of networked software, sensors, devices and [...]

The post Pixel Velocity<sup>®</sup> Releases Innovative Hydrocarbon Leak Detection System and Event Management Platform appeared first on Pixel Velocity.

item.title: Pixel Velocity® Incorporated Completes $10,000,000 Capital Raise
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
ANN ARBOR, Mich., Feb. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ — Pixel Velocity® Incorporated (“Pixel Velocity®” or the “Company”), an image processing and data analytic product company that helps provide safety, security and operational continuity solutions to commercial and government facilities of strategic and financial importance, has raised approximately $10,000,000 through the sale of shares of Series B [...]

The post Pixel Velocity<sup>®</sup> Incorporated Completes $10,000,000 Capital Raise appeared first on Pixel Velocity.
